# schemable-ts-types

This package exposes io-ts-types built for use with `Schema` and `Schemable` in io-ts.

## Install

Uses `fp-ts`, and `io-ts` as peer dependencies. Read more about peer dependencies at [nodejs.org](https://nodejs.org/en/blog/npm/peer-dependencies/).

### Yarn

```bash
yarn add fp-ts io-ts schemable-ts-types
```

### NPM

```bash
npm install fp-ts io-ts schemable-ts-types
```

## Documentation

- [Docs](https://jacob-alford.github.io/schemable-ts-types/modules/)
